projectValues.description: Values from outside for example Terraform.

global.description: This section holds properties that apply globally across the entire schema.

helm.description: This object holds the properties related to the Helm, a package manager for Kubernetes.

targetRevision.description: The specific version or branch of the chart that should be deployed.

parameters.description: A set of key-value pairs representing configuration parameters specific to Helm.

charts.description: Here you register and configure the helm charts.

namespace.description: The Kubernetes namespace where the chart should be deployed.

repoURL.description: URL of the Helm repository containing the chart.

targetRevision.description: The specific version or branch of the chart that should be deployed.

overrideChartName.description: An optional property to override the default name of the chart.

disableAutoSync.description: Boolean value to enable or disable automatic synchronization of the chart through ArgoCD.

parameters.description: A set of key-value pairs representing chart-specific configuration parameters.

path.description: The local path to the helm chart which is inside a git repo.

valueFile.description: The local path to a values file to be used when deploying the chart.

preventDelete.description: Boolean value that determines whether deletion of the deployed chart is prevented or allowed.
